basic_information.scholarship_name: Access Financial Resources Financial Planning Scholarship

description: To provide scholarship assistance to Oklahoma residents with a declared Financial Planning minor. Eligibility Requirements Students must have minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA Must be currently enrolled at least half-time. Selection Process Preference goes to Spanish speaking students and/or students pursuing a degree in social work, therapy, or psychology. Award Requirements Students must be enrolled for the semester the scholarship will be disbursed.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Enrolled_Status is Full Time   or SIS_Enrolled_Status is Part Time
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Enrolled_Status is Full Time   or SIS_Enrolled_Status is Part Time

criteria.description: SIS_Minor_2 is Finance-Financial Planning   or SIS_Minor is Finance-Financial Planning   or SIS_Minor_1_2 is Finance-Financial Planning   or SIS_Minor_2_2 is Finance-Financial Planning
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Minor_2 is Finance-Financial Planning   or SIS_Minor is Finance-Financial Planning   or SIS_Minor_1_2 is Finance-Financial Planning   or SIS_Minor_2_2 is Finance-Financial Planning

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
